label: Refract
description: Calculate the refraction direction for an incident vector.

zh.Calculate the refraction direction for a: 计算入射向量的折射方向。

data.glsl:
void run(vec2 uv, vec3 I, vec3 N, float eta, out vec3 res) { res = refract(I, N, eta); }
void run(vec2 uv, vec2 I, vec2 N, float eta, out vec2 res) { res = refract(I, N, eta); }
